title: How to get extremely rich any books I should read about real estate investing stocks etc - Quora

response.answer_text: It is very difficult to get extremely rich. The most common way to get rich is to start a successful business, become a high level executive, celebrity, major league athlete, lottery, or inheritance. Let me tell you how to get wealthy: Becoming wealthy is much more attainable. This requires a stable high income job for 20+ years and solid investing skills. These types of jobs include Physician, Dentist, Pharmacist, Lawyer, etc. if you are able to get one of these jobs, work until retirement age, and invest in stocks and real estate you should have a good chance of becoming wealthy. Wealthy is considered when an individual has a net worth of at least $2,000,000.
